segments.text: Yes , Miss , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ordered my dish about a half an hour ago , but it hasn't arrived yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry for that , I'm going to check with the chef right now . Miss , I just checked with the kitchen , and they said your order will be coming right up next . Oh , here comes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Miss , I'm very sorry for the delay , please enjoy this . Free a glass of wine for inconvenience . Again I'm terribly sorry to make you wait so long .
segments.speaker: S2
